description: Resource Schema describing various properties for AWS Proton Environment Account Connections resources.

Status.markdownDescription:
---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Allowed Values: PENDING | CONNECTED | REJECTED  
Update requires: No interruption

Key.markdownDescription:
The key of the resource tag.

--- Required: Yes Type: String Minimum Length: 1 Maximum Length: 128 Update requires: No interruption

Value.markdownDescription:
The value of the resource tag.

--- Required: Yes Type: String Maximum Length: 256 Update requires: No interruption

Tag.markdownDescription:
A description of a resource tag.

--- Required: No Update requires: No interruption

CodebuildRoleArn.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of an IAM service role in the environment account. AWS Proton uses this role to provision infrastructure resources using CodeBuild-based provisioning in the associated environment account.
CodebuildRoleArn.markdownDescription:
The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of an IAM service role in the environment account. AWS Proton uses this role to provision infrastructure resources using CodeBuild-based provisioning in the associated environment account.

---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Minimum Length: 1  
Maximum Length: 200  
Pattern: ^arn:(aws|aws-cn|aws-us-gov):iam::\d{12}:role/([\w+=,.@-]{1,512}[/:])*([\w+=,.@-]{1,64})$  
Update requires: No interruption

ComponentRoleArn.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the IAM service role that AWS Proton uses when provisioning directly defined components in the associated environment account. It determines the scope of infrastructure that a component can provision in the account.
ComponentRoleArn.markdownDescription:
The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the IAM service role that AWS Proton uses when provisioning directly defined components in the associated environment account. It determines the scope of infrastructure that a component can provision in the account.

---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Minimum Length: 1  
Maximum Length: 200  
Pattern: ^arn:(aws|aws-cn|aws-us-gov):iam::\d{12}:role/([\w+=,.@-]{1,512}[/:])*([\w+=,.@-]{1,64})$  
Update requires: No interruption

EnvironmentAccountId.description: The environment account that's connected to the environment account connection.
EnvironmentAccountId.markdownDescription:
The environment account that's connected to the environment account connection.

---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Pattern: ^\d{12}$  
Update requires: No interruption

EnvironmentName.description: The name of the AWS Proton environment that's created in the associated management account.
EnvironmentName.markdownDescription:
The name of the AWS Proton environment that's created in the associated management account.

---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Minimum Length: 1  
Maximum Length: 100  
Pattern: ^[0-9A-Za-z]+[0-9A-Za-z_\-]*$  
Update requires: No interruption

ManagementAccountId.description: The ID of the management account that accepts or rejects the environment account connection. You create an manage the AWS Proton environment in this account. If the management account accepts the environment account connection, AWS Proton can use the associated IAM role to provision environment infrastructure resources in the associated environment account.
ManagementAccountId.markdownDescription:
The ID of the management account that accepts or rejects the environment account connection. You create an manage the AWS Proton environment in this account. If the management account accepts the environment account connection, AWS Proton can use the associated IAM role to provision environment infrastructure resources in the associated environment account.

---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Pattern: ^\d{12}$  
Update requires: No interruption

RoleArn.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the IAM service role that's created in the environment account. AWS Proton uses this role to provision infrastructure resources in the associated environment account.
RoleArn.markdownDescription:
The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the IAM service role that's created in the environment account. AWS Proton uses this role to provision infrastructure resources in the associated environment account.

---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Minimum Length: 1  
Maximum Length: 200  
Pattern: ^arn:(aws|aws-cn|aws-us-gov):iam::\d{12}:role/([\w+=,.@-]{1,512}[/:])*([\w+=,.@-]{1,64})$  
Update requires: No interruption

Tags.description:
An optional list of metadata items that you can associate with the Proton environment account connection. A tag is a key-value pair.

For more information, see Proton resources and tagging in the Proton User Guide.
Tags.markdownDescription:
An optional list of metadata items that you can associate with the Proton environment account connection. A tag is a key-value pair.

For more information, see Proton resources and tagging in the Proton User Guide.

--- Required: No Type: Array Update requires: No interruption

Arn.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the environment account connection.
Arn.markdownDescription:
The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the environment account connection.

---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Update requires: No interruption

Id.description: The ID of the environment account connection.
Id.markdownDescription:
The ID of the environment account connection.

---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Pattern: ^[0-9a-f]{8}-[0-9a-f]{4}-[0-9a-f]{4}-[0-9a-f]{4}-[0-9a-f]{12}$  
Update requires: No interruption

Status.description: The status of the environment account connection.
Status.markdownDescription:
The status of the environment account connection.

---

Required: No  
Type:   
Update requires: No interruption
